Hero.description: I deliver measurable growth and efficiency through robust full-stack architecture. Transform your complex challenges into high-performance, user-centric digital products.
Hero.title: Empowering Businesses with scalable <lightGradient>Node.js & React Solutions</lightGradient>

seo.description: You're looking for a Lead Tech React.js / Node.js to develop your application ? I'm here to help you. Discover my work on my portfolio and contact me.
seo.title: Adrien Guesnel - Freelance Lead Tech React.js / Node.js

EngineeringPhilosophy.title: My engineering <primary>philosophy</primary>
EngineeringPhilosophy.description: Durable systems, accessible interfaces, and performance-calibrated tooling let the teams I partner with ship features with confidence. These three pillars describe how I think about every project I touch.

pillars.title: Clean Architecture
pillars.description: Modular boundaries keep the codebase durable and predictable, so every iteration stays composable and testable.

pillars.title: Human-Centric Logic
pillars.description: Interfaces are tuned to real needs, ensuring complexity lives under the hood while experiences stay intuitive.

pillars.title: Performance First
pillars.description: Every choice balances speed and clarity, from release automation to interactions that feel responsive.

Projects.heading: Selected projects
Projects.description: Technical challenges and measurable outcomes from the past decade of work.

professionalProjects.title: Private jet booking platform - Loop Aero
professionalProjects.challenge: Led the development of the Loop Aero private jet reservation platform from scratch using React.js, Next.js, and NestJS.
professionalProjects.solution: Built the design system, orchestrated API integrations and backend architecture, and led the technical direction with regular alignment syncs.
impact: Aligned requirements with the client and project manager through frequent checkpoints
Mentored a junior developer and safeguarded deliverable quality via reviews
Delivered a polished UI with fast loading screens

personalProjects.title: Professional portfolio
personalProjects.challenge: Clearly convey my freelance React/Node.js positioning.
personalProjects.solution: This site explains my technical philosophy, showcases project work, and shares testimonials from past collaborations.
impact: Demonstrated technical expertise through this open-source build
Get qualified leads via the contact form

Testimonials.title: My clients trust me
Testimonials.description: Partners who shared how the collaboration unfolded: clear milestones, responsive feedback, and a constant pursuit of quality.

cards.quote: We hired Adrien to build a feature for our LMS (NextJS, Python etc.). He grasped the stakes and needs very quickly, then delivered the work at pace. No complaints— it was a superb experience.

Adrien is without a doubt the developer I’ve enjoyed working with most as a product designer. He listens, challenges, and supports the product thinking while bringing his engineering mindset—always with kindness and intelligence.
